Hey Angertek, thaks for you upload and the reply about the Premiere Pro content.

The thing is that this assittional content seems to have nothing to do with the missed presets and codecs. These are in the intalled folder all of them, it seems. But they are not avalable in the application.

The additional content from thethingy is a large update of some kind from Adobe, as it seems, of more than 700 MB, and obviously about other feature. I so far not have found out what actually is. 
Neither this nor the update to CS 6.0.1 does anything with the missing presets and codecs. At least not on my computer....

Anyway, Premiere Pro CS6 works well with dslr-files by using the feature "New sequence from clip", but will probably work better with the right codecs that will be available with the missing prsets activated.

Thanks again, we appreciate very much that you folks do something to make these applications available for people like me who can't afford to pay Adobes ridicolous prizes.

So if it is missing something, is not the crack, is the program it self and i think if you search for it you might find the answer to the question in the adobe forums. trust me i have the full version bought of the master collection and i can assure you there is no difference what so ever

Also, i cant help you if you just comment a complain. You have to explain your problem i cannot guess which computer you have, and how you are installing it. I dont't do magic, no one does magic all the uploads by everyone are based on cracks that should work on every standard computer. One specific case might have a variation. Not even the best crackers " Razor, thethingy, Chichu, MAFIAA " they cannot make a crack that will work for all specific cases there are always exceptions. SO unless you explain what your problem is you are hopeless.. Now i suggest to explain your problem and maybe i can help.
And stop saying is a lie, at least i tried and it worked for some people...

Whenever I click on "adobe.cs6.all.products.activator.(x32.y.x64)_up01-MPT.exe" I get the message:

OK!!

I've figured out that was because of my Mcaffee antivirus! I switched it off for a few minutes and the problem ceased!

It does look like I've installed the whole thing now, finally! Including Premiere presets!

Muchisimas gracias and good luck to all!

Hey, Im trying to fix Adobe Encore, but I get stuck at the step where you need to put in the serials. The problem I have is that after 8 times of putting them in I still get an error message at startup, saying not royalized key. The thing I noticed that's different from the guy in the video is that I always get the adobe agreement the first time when the SLStore stuff is deleted and the SLcache is deleted. After agreeing I need to input a serial just like the installer for cs6. That's only the first time I execute the program when that windows comes up.Then when the program is loading I get the error message and it's asking for a serial code directly and I use the first code in the instructions. I then close the program and the validation window comes up before the program, when I open it the second time. I activate it offline and then a serial window comes up and I input the second serial. Then if I continue like that it just lopps around and the error message never disappears, unless I validate one of the validation pop-ups. The process then stops and no more pop-ups come up except for the error message 

Does anyone know a solution to this?

This solution worked for me, I can't promise it will work for everyone.. try it out guys:

1) Uninstall Premiere CS6
2) Reinstall Premiere CS6
3) Open Premiere once and click 'continue trial', then close the program.
4) Delete the file: ' /program files (x86)/common files/adobe/adobe pcd/cache/cache.db'
5) Apply the cracked .dll file




Premiere Pro Error: "Unable to find compatible video modules" 
(If you have AMD HD Graphics)
1. Go to the Catalyst Control Center Application
2. Click "Power"
3. Click "Switchable Graphics"
4. Set everything to "High Performance"
5. "gpusniffer.exe" is Premiere Pro, set it to 
"High Performance"
6. Check the box that says "Show a pop-up 
warning for unassigned applications".

*Premiere Pro & Encore both require 3D graphics and won't run without them. 
I thought that my Premiere Pro and Encore weren't cracked properly, then I did this and both work no problem (Encore was freezing after I selected New Project).

Many people still say it doesn't work for them so i got another solution you could try. Although all of the solutions  i have provided should work...
Here:
1. Start Program in trial mode
2. Enter 1325-0949-2080-9819-3777-3230 (If it asks)
3. Block from internet
4. It will say something like Can't validate Key... You have 7 days to re-try
5. Hit "Connect later" and Prog will start.
6. Close prog
7. Open Program location and re-name "amtlib.dll" to "_amtlib.OLD"
8. Copy the crack "amtlib.dll" (X64) to program folder
9. Re-Start Program
10. Make FIREWALL Rules: ALLOW Local addresses and BLOCK everything else!!
11. Should be working now... Copy over Library and Styles folder from previous CS*
12. DONE!

Extra: ( simple explanations ) We repeat the activation various times 

so that Encore can keep record of multiple activations and thus at 

the end have a series of days of activation accumulated this means 

that encore might not work forever but it should last more than a 

year. Updating it might help make it last longer. If it stops working 

after a while unistall and please repeat all proccess from the 

begginging.  You might also want to try after doing this coping the patcher to the Encore directory running it and trying step 9 and all of its parts again.
				I hope you enjoy.
